name: core-enforcer
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.

If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.
